TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Transaction extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class Transaction Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
type Transaction = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Transaction extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 表示事务。

span.span: Represents a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间提供基于 类的显式编程模型和使用 类的隐式编程模型，在后一种模型中，事务由该基础结构自动管理。The namespace provides both an explicit programming model based on the class, as well as an implicit programming model using the class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure. 我们强烈建议你使用易于开发的隐式模型。We recommend highly that you use the easier implicit model for development. 若要开始使用，请参阅 [使用事务范围实现隐式事务](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope) 主题。To get started, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope) topic. 有关编写事务应用程序的详细信息，请参阅 [编写事务应用程序](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application)。For more information on writing a transactional application, see [Writing A Transactional Application](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application). 类包含开发人员用来实现资源管理器的方法。The class contains methods used by developers implementing resource managers for enlistment. 它还提供了用于克隆事务和控制当前事务上下文的功能。It also provides functionalities for cloning a transaction and controlling the current transaction context. 如果已设置，则可以使用静态属性获取当前事务 。You can obtain the current transaction, if one is set, using the static property.

span.span: This type is thread safe.
Participating in a Transaction

summary.span: 创建事务的克隆。

span.span: Creates a clone of the transaction.

returns.span: 一个 作为当前事务对象的副本。

span.span: A that is a copy of the current transaction object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建用于传递事务的克隆。Clones are created to pass transactions. 例如，你可能不想将传递 给其他应用程序，因为你不希望其他人提交事务。For example, you might not want to pass a to other applications, because you do not want others to commit your transaction. 如果尝试封送或序列化事务，则会自动为您创建一个克隆。If you try to marshal or serialize a transaction, a clone is created for you automatically.

summary.span: 获取或设置环境事务。

span.span: Gets or sets the ambient transaction.
A that describes the current transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关环境事务的详细信息，请参阅 [使用事务范围实现隐式事务](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope) 主题中的 "使用 TransactionScopeOption 管理事务流" 部分。For more information on ambient transactions, please see the "Managing transaction flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing an Implicit Transaction using Transaction Scope](/dotnet/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope) topic. 尽管可以使用此属性设置环境事务，但应 尽可能使用对象来操作环境事务。Although you can set the ambient transaction using this property, you should use the object to manipulate the ambient transaction whenever possible. 此属性是线程静态的。This property is thread static. 如果使用中的此属性更改环境事务，则 在调用时会引发 ，而以前的环境事务值将被还原。If you change the ambient transaction using this property inside a an is thrown when is called, and the previous ambient transaction value is restored.

summary.span: 创建事务的依赖复本。

span.span: Creates a dependent clone of the transaction.

returns.span: 一个 表示依赖克隆。

span.span: A that represents the dependent clone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从属事务是一个事务，其结果取决于克隆的事务的结果。A dependent transaction is a transaction whose outcome depends on the outcome of the transaction from which it was cloned. `cloneoption`参数控制要创建的依赖事务的类型。The `cloneoption` parameter controls what kind of dependent transaction to create. 如果使用创建依赖事务 ，则它会阻止事务的提交过程，直到事务超时或 在上调用 。If a dependent transaction is created with , it blocks the commit process of the transaction until the transaction times out, or is called on the . 如果是用创建的 ，则 在调用之前调用时，它会自动中止事务 。If it is created with , it automatically aborts the transaction if is called before is called on the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建从属事务。The following example shows you how to create a dependent transaction. [!code-csharp[Tx_DependentTx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_dependenttx/cs/dependenttx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_DependentTx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_dependenttx/vb/dependenttx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 登记持久资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **注意** 此方法使用 来防止不受信任的代码调用; 但是，只有直接调用方才能拥有 `FullTrust` 权限集。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 登记支持两阶段提交的持久资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有持久登记的资源管理器遇到失败，则必须能够执行恢复。Resource managers with a durable enlistment must be able to perform recovery if they experience a failure. 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅 [执行恢复](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691). 有关可变资源和持久资源以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅 [实现资源管理器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 有关资源管理器如何响应提交通知并在两阶段提交中准备提交的详细信息，请参阅 [在单阶段和多阶段提交事务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit in two-phase commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d). 通过此方法登记以参与事务的资源管理器接收两阶段提交通知，它们对应于接口上定义的方法 。Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the interface.

summary.span: 登记支持单阶段提交优化的持久资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有持久登记的资源管理器遇到失败，则必须能够执行恢复。Resource managers with a durable enlistment must be able to perform recovery if they experience a failure. 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅 [执行恢复](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691). 有关可变资源和持久资源以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅 [实现资源管理器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 请注意，即使资源管理器实现使用此方法登记，也不能保证它收到单阶段提交。You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit. 事务管理器仍可以改为发送两阶段提交通知。The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead. 有关单阶段提交优化的详细信息，请参阅 [使用单阶段提交和可提升的单阶段通知进行优化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)).

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EnlistPromotableSinglePhase (System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification promotableSinglePhaseNotification, Guid promoterType);

.method public hidebysig instance bool EnlistPromotableSinglePhase(class System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification promotableSinglePhaseNotification, valuetype System.Guid promoterType) cil managed
Public Function EnlistPromotableSinglePhase (promotableSinglePhaseNotification As IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification, promoterType As Guid) As Boolean
public: bool EnlistPromotableSinglePhase(System::Transactions::IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification ^ promotableSinglePhaseNotification, Guid promoterType);
member this.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase : System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification * Guid -> bool

param.name: promotableSinglePhaseNotification
param.span: 由参与者实现的 接口。

span.span: A interface implemented by the participant.

param.name: promoterType
param.span: 分布式事务处理器的类型。

span.span: The type of the distributed transaction processor.

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

returns.span: 描述登记的 接口实现。

span.span: A interface implementation that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为参数指定的值 `promoterType` 为 `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc` ，则 **必须** 由 msdtc 提升事务，并且 `byte[]` 从方法返回的 `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` **必须** 是 msdtc 事务传播标记。If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`, the transaction **must** be promoted by MSDTC and the `byte[]` returned from the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method **must** be an MSDTC transaction propagation token. 如果为参数指定的值 `promoterType` 不是**not** `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC` ，则不会由 MSDTC 提升事务，而是由调用方的实现来提升 `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification` 。If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is **not**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`, the transaction will not be promoted by MSDTC, but rather by the caller's implementation of `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`. 如果此调用成功，将在事务上包含一组后续操作，该操作将返回 `TransactionPromotionException` 。If this call is successful, there is a set of subsequent operations on the transaction that will return a `TransactionPromotionException`. 这些操作包括：These operations are: - `Transaction.EnlistDurable` - `TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction` - `TransactionInterop.GetExportCookie` - `TransactionInterop.GetTransmitterPropagationToken` - 事务对象的序列化Serialization of a Transaction object

param.name: promotableSinglePhaseNotification
param.span: 由参与者实现的 接口。

span.span: A interface implemented by the participant.

param.name: notification
param.span: 由参与者实现的 接口。

span.span: A interface implemented by the participant.

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

returns.span: 描述登记的 接口实现。

span.span: A interface implementation that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务中的登记是可变的;也就是说，它们不会经受参与者的故障。Enlistments in a transaction are volatile; that is, they do not survive the failure of the participant. 此外，此方法仅建议事务管理器提升控制，但不保证升级本身。In addition, this method only suggests the transaction manager to escalate control, but the escalation itself is not guaranteed. 如果升级失败，则不会通知用户并回滚事务。If escalation fails, the user is not notified and the transaction is rolled back. 参数 `promotableSinglePhaseNotification` 用于与事务管理器进行通信，尝试提交资源管理器的内部事务的结果。The parameter `promotableSinglePhaseNotification` is used to communicate to the transaction manager the outcome of attempting to commit the resource manager's internal transaction. 如果报告的数据不一致，事务管理器将引发异常。If inconsistent data is reported, the transaction manager throws an exception. 如果 报告了结果，则事务管理器会在其自己的内部登记中查找结果通知，并忽略报告的响应。If an outcome is reported, the transaction manager looks for the outcome notification in its own internal enlistment and ignores the reported response. 有关登记和事务升级的详细信息，请参阅 [事务管理升级](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7)。For more information on enlistments and escalation of a transaction, please see [Transaction Management Escalation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7). 有关 PSPE 的详细信息，请参阅 [使用单阶段提交和可提升的单阶段通知进行优化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on PSPE, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)). **注意** 此方法使用 来防止不受信任的代码调用; 但是，只有直接调用方才能拥有 `FullTrust` 权限集。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 登记可变资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可变资源管理器无法从故障中恢复，因而无法完成参与的事务。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 有关可变资源和持久资源以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅 [实现资源管理器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 有关资源管理器如何响应提交通知并准备提交的详细信息，请参阅 [在单阶段和多阶段中提交事务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d).

An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可变资源管理器无法从故障中恢复，因而无法完成参与的事务。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 若要获取事务中的持久登记，请使用 方法。To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the method. 通过此方法登记以参与事务的资源管理器接收两阶段提交通知，它们对应于接口上定义的方法 。Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例演示接口的实现 ，并使用方法将对象作为事务中的参与者登记 。The following example shows an implementation of interface, as well as enlisting the object as a participant in a transaction using the method. [!code-csharp[Tx_Enlist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/cs/enlist.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_Enlist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/vb/enlist.vb#1)]

summary.span: 登记支持单阶段提交优化的可变资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可变资源管理器无法从故障中恢复，因而无法完成参与的事务。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 若要获取事务中的持久登记，请使用 方法。To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the method. 有关可变资源和持久资源以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅 [实现资源管理器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 有关资源管理器如何响应提交通知并准备提交的详细信息，请参阅 [在单阶段和多阶段中提交事务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d). 请注意，即使资源管理器实现使用此方法登记，也不能保证它收到单阶段提交。You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit. 事务管理器仍可以改为发送两阶段提交通知。The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead. 有关单阶段提交优化的详细信息，请参阅 [使用单阶段提交和可提升的单阶段通知进行优化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)).

span.span: Implementing A Resource Manager

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] GetPromotedToken ();
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetPromotedToken() cil managed
Public Function GetPromotedToken () As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetPromotedToken();
member this.GetPromotedToken : unit -> byte[]

summary.span: 获取提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte []。

span.span: Gets the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

returns.span: 提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte []。

span.span: The byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的副作用是导致事务提升（如果尚未升级）。This method has the side effect of causing promotion of the transaction if it is not already promoted. 返回的格式 `byte[]` 由属性的值定义 `Transaction.PromoterType` 。The format of the returned `byte[]` is defined by the value of the `Transaction.PromoterType` property. 如果属性的值 `Transaction.PromoterType` 为 `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc` 或 `Guid.Empty` ，则 `byte[]` 此方法返回的为 MSDTC 发送器传播标记。If the value of the `Transaction.PromoterType` property is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc` or `Guid.Empty`, then the `byte[]` returned by this method is an MSDTC transmitter propagation token. 属性的任何其他值 `Transaction.PromoterType` 指定由调用方定义的 `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` 属性类型值的格式。Any other value for the `Transaction.PromoterType` property specifies a format that is defined by the caller of `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` that specified the property type value. 为了解释此后一种情况下已升级的标记，您将需要查阅执行调用的代码的文档 `EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` 。In order to interpret the promoted token in this latter case, you will need to consult the documentation for the code that made the `EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` call.

summary.span: 获取事务的隔离级别。

span.span: Gets the isolation level of the transaction.

value.span: 值之一，该值指示事务的隔离级别。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the isolation level of the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务的隔离级别决定了在事务完成之前，其他事务对可变数据的访问级别。The isolation level of a transaction determines what level of access other transactions have to volatile data before a transaction completes. 有关隔离级别的详细信息，请参阅枚举的文档 。For more information about isolation levels, see the documentation for the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public Guid PromoterType { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Guid PromoterType
Public ReadOnly Property PromoterType As Guid
public: property Guid PromoterType { Guid get(); };
member this.PromoterType : Guid

summary.span: 对提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte [] 的格式进行唯一标识。

span.span: Uniquely identifies the format of the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

value.span: 一个 guid，用于唯一标识升级方法在事务升级时返回的 byte [] 的格式。

span.span: A guid that uniquely identifies the format of the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事务尚未升级并且尚未具有可提升的单阶段登记，则此属性的值将为 `Guid.Empty` 。If the transaction has not yet been promoted and does not yet have a promotable single phase enlistment, the value of this property will be `Guid.Empty`. 如果事务已或将升级到 MSDTC，则此属性的值将为 `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc` 。If the transaction has been or will be promoted to MSDTC, then the value of this property will be `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`. 如果事务已或将由非 MSDTC 提升程序升级，则此属性的值将是指定给之前对的调用的值 `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` 。If the transaction has been or will be promoted by a non-MSDTC promoter, the value of this property will be the value specified to an earlier call to `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`.

summary.span: 回滚（中止）事务。

span.span: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rollback ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Rollback() cil managed
Public Sub Rollback ()
public: void Rollback();
member this.Rollback : unit -> unit

summary.span: 回滚（中止）事务。

span.span: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务对象的任何副本都可以通过调用此方法来启动事务的回滚。Any copy of a transaction object can initiate the rollback of the transaction by calling this method. 只有原始事务对象（ 对象）可以用于启动提交事务的尝试。Only the original transaction object, which is a object, can be used to initiate an attempt to commit the transaction. 如果已确定事务的结果后调用此方法，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown when this method is called after the outcome of the transaction has already been determined.

param.name: distributedTransactionIdentifier
param.span: 分布式事务管理器使用的事务的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the transaction used by the distributed transaction manager.

summary.span: 设置由非 MSDTC 提升程序生成的分布式事务标识符。

span.span: Sets the distributed transaction identifier generated by the non-MSDTC promoter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有处理方法时才能成功调用此方法 `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` 。This method can only be called successfully while the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method is being processed. 如果在任何其他时间调用此方法，则 `TransactionException` 将引发。If this method is called at any other time, a `TransactionException` is thrown. 参数的指定值 `promotableNotification` 必须是最初指定给调用的相同对象 `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` 。The specified value of the `promotableNotification` parameter must be the same object that was originally specified to the `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` invocation. 如果不是这种情况，则 `InvalidOperationException` 会引发。If this is not the case, then an `InvalidOperationException` is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler TransactionCompleted;

Public Custom Event TransactionCompleted As TransactionCompletedEventHandler
public: event System::Transactions::TransactionCompletedEventHandler ^ TransactionCompleted;
member this.TransactionCompleted : System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 指示事务已完成。

span.span: Indicates that the transaction is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以注册此事件，而不是使用可变登记来获取事务的结果信息。You can register for this event instead of using a volatile enlistment to get outcome information for transactions. 传递给委托的参数 是一个 实例。The parameter passed to the delegate is a instance. 然后，您可以查询 特定实例的属性以获取的实例 ，该实例的 属性包含具有或值的事务的状态 。You can then query the property of the specific instance to get an instance of , whose property contains the status of a transaction with either the or value. **警告** 注册此事件将对其附加到的事务的性能产生负面影响。**Caution** Signing up for this event negatively affects the performance of the transaction it is attached to. ## Examples 下面的示例演示应用程序如何通过订阅事件来获取事务的结果 。The following sample shows how an application can obtain the outcome of a transaction by subscribing to the event. [!code-csharp[Tx_Outcome#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_outcome/cs/txoutcome.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_Outcome#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_outcome/vb/txoutcome.vb#1)]

exception.span: 尝试在已处置的事务上订阅此事件。

span.span: An attempt to subscribe this event on a transaction that has been disposed.
